name: Stomp 'N Clonk
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours.

Explore the ancient temple and collect the shimmering orbs to complete the stages!

Controls:
Left Mouse Button to Move the Player on his turn.
Move the Player over enemies to stomp them.
The dices decide the remaining steps you have per round.
Watch for the arrows over enemies heads to see their intended move.

We had a lot more content planned but had to cut our game short due to time contraints, still, it was a lot of fun overall and a great learning experience!

Programming: Ivan S.
Art/ Sound Design: DiCocco
